content: apple crisp hat by katie clary the perfect fall newborn hat for gifting or charity this hat beautifully melds crisp delicious texture with easy breezy construction using only basic stitch love yarn cherry about 100 yds 4 worsted weight yarn scissors yarn needle abbreviations chain- chain double_crochet - double_crochet skip - skip tbl - through back loop special stitches double_crochet tbl work your double_crochet through the back loop of the stitch only finished size newborn - 13 5-14 circumference 5 height 4 25 diameter at the crown row 4 notes lion brand pound of love is listed as a 4 worsted weight yarn but i find it to be a tad lighter than most 4 weight yarns if you re looking for a comparable substitute caron simply soft is a good match if you choose a thicker yarn such as red heart soft/with love try beginning the crown with 10 stitches to make a newborn size or stick with 12 and get a slightly larger 0-3month size hat the crown of the hat is worked as a simple flat circle to change the size of the hat simply work either more stitches or more increases until the crown reaches your desired size then work enough row to allow for extra height for example a 0-3 month hat might increase for an extra round and begin in pattern on row 6 my daughter s purple hat a typical teen size we have giant heads was worked in a slightly thicker yarn caron one pound and an i/5 5mm hook the crown started with 12 stitches and increased for 5 rounds continuing in pattern on row 6 the brim row 15-17 added three row of 2x2 crochet ribbing fpdc 2 bpdc 2 with a smaller h/5mm hook for grip apple crisp hat crochet pattern round 1 chain 2 and double_crochet 12 stitches into a magic_ring sl to join 12 ​ round 2 chain 2 2dc in each st around sl to join 24 ​ round 3 chain 2 *2dc double_crochet* around sl to join 36 ​ round 4 chain 2 *2dc double_crochet 2* around sl to join 48 ​ round 5 chain 2 skip 1 *double_crochet tbl double_crochet* around working your last stitch into the skipped st sl to join 48 ​ rounds 6- 10 repeat round 5 48 ​ break yarn fasten_off and weave in ends copyright 2017 kathryn l clary of salty pearl crochet all rights reserved for more information visit
